name: Salve via Disenchanting
tooltip:
Salve via Disenchanting

The power of a disenchanted magical item is felt by the essence it creates.  I've devised a way to turn raw essence used by enchanters into a suitable reagent for creating Cenarion plant salve.  You don't need a Cenarion beacon for this; any suitably disenchanted item that yields lesser nether essences will work.

I just need a single lesser nether essence; in exchange, I will give you Cenarion plant salves.  The essence is extremely potent - a little definitely goes a long way!

Requirements:
- Lesser Nether Essence
